message: ... and I just realized today is the 17th.
Early Bird goes on sale tomorrow. We have a limited number so I'm encouraging people tp purchase early. I'll be there. :P

bought my ticket about 30 seconds after they went on sale, then went to bed. Yikes why am I up after only 4.5 hours of sleep?
Haha. Sounds like coffee time for you Sean
yes it is, time for some breakfast and then out the door for an early morning class.
